func.func_description: 以最大速度和夹力阈值参数打开夹爪
func.func_description_en: Open the jaws at maximum speed and clamping force threshold parameters

first.param_description: 等待夹爪打开所需时间，单位：毫秒
first.param_description_en: Time to wait for gripper to open in milliseconds

func.func_description: 以最大速度和夹力阈值参数关闭夹爪
func.func_description_en: Close the gripper jaws with maximum speed and gripping force threshold parameters

first.param_description: 等待夹爪关闭所需时间，单位：毫秒
first.param_description_en: Time to wait for gripper to close in milliseconds

func.func_description: 根据配置的速度、夹力运动到指定位置
func.func_description_en: Move to the specified position according to the configured speed and clamping force

first.param_description: 夹爪目标位置，0是完全张开，255是完全关闭

fourth.param_description: 等待夹爪运动所需时间，单位：毫秒
fourth.param_description_en: Waiting time for gripper movement, unit: ms
